persistlayer

Interface DbAccessInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DbAccessImpl

    public interface DbAccessInterface
    This is the interface for accessing the database.
    Author:
    connor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.sql.Connection connect()
      This method loads the JDBC driver and opens a connection to the MySQL database.
      int create(java.sql.Connection con, java.lang.String query)
      This method runs a given SQL query that creates rows in the database.
      int delete(java.sql.Connection con, java.lang.String query)
      This method runs a given SQL query that deletes a row in the database.
      void disconnect(java.sql.Connection con)
      This method disconnects the given connection.
      java.sql.ResultSet retrieve(java.sql.Connection con, java.lang.String query)
      This method runs a given SQL query and returns the results as a ResultSet.
      int update(java.sql.Connection con, java.lang.String query)
      This method runs a given SQL query that updates rows in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        java.sql.Connection connect()
        This method loads the JDBC driver and opens a connection to the MySQL database.
        Returns:
        Connection object to the MySQL database

      • retrieve

        java.sql.ResultSet retrieve(java.sql.Connection con,
                            java.lang.String query)
        This method runs a given SQL query and returns the results as a ResultSet.
        Parameters:
        con - Connection object.
        query - Query to execute.
        Returns:
        ResultSet of executed query.

      • create

        int create(java.sql.Connection con,
           java.lang.String query)
        This method runs a given SQL query that creates rows in the database. It returns the number of rows affected as an int.
        Parameters:
        con - Connection object.
        query - Query to execute.
        Returns:
        The number of rows affected by query.

      • update

        int update(java.sql.Connection con,
           java.lang.String query)
        This method runs a given SQL query that updates rows in the database. It returns the number of rows affected as an int.
        Parameters:
        con - Connection object.
        query - Query to execute.
        Returns:
        The number of rows affected by query.

      • delete

        int delete(java.sql.Connection con,
           java.lang.String query)
        This method runs a given SQL query that deletes a row in the database. It returns the number of rows affected as an int.
        Parameters:
        con - Connection object.
        query - Query to execute.
        Returns:
        The number of rows affected by query.

      • disconnect

        void disconnect(java.sql.Connection con)
        This method disconnects the given connection.
        Parameters:
        con - Connection to disconnect.
